Body:
I have 2 IoT devices, I can write C program to run on both devices to implement BlockChain.

The idea is to secure the IoT device records in a BlockChain.

Can I develop my own BlockChain for this project?

Since the database shouldn't be centralized, where should the records blocks be stored?

Can I use C to implement the BlockChain?

Do I have to write Javascript code and interact with some API?
